idea-plugin.name: XTools
idea-plugin.description:
XTools plugin




GitHub | Gitee



English
  • Run tests based on SpringBoot and SpringMvc developed interfaces.
  • Integration port closed, quickly generate Markdown file small function.
  • Code conversion tools (case, hump, underline, YML to Pro).
  • If you have any Suggestions or bugs during continuous optimization, please email to 819536266@qq.com ,Thank you .
中文
  • 运行基于SpringBoot开发接口的测试.
  • 集成端口关闭，快速生成Markdown文件小功能.
  • 代码转化工具（大小写、驼峰、下划线、YML转PRO）.
  • 在持续优化过程中,如有任何建议或bug，请发邮件至819536266@qq.com,谢谢.
